body.p: Vermont soldier. Vergennes, Vermont, native. Grandson of Ethan Allen. Graduated from the United States Military Academy in West Point, New York, in 1817. Commissioned Captain in the 1st United States Infantry Regiment in 1824. Inspector General on the staff of Winfield Scott during the Mexican-American War. Commissioned Colonel of the 2nd United States Infantry Regiment in 1851. Resigned from the United States Army in 1855. St. Louis, Missouri, resident. Commissioned Major General of Volunteers in the United States Army in 1862. Detailed on service as commissioner for the exchange of prisoners. Appointed Commissary General of Prisoners in November 1865.
